name: Slither Re/dux: Treasures of the Baghdad Palace (C64)
name_original: Slither Re/dux: Treasures of the Baghdad Palace (C64)
description:
Slither Re/dux: Treasures of the Baghdad Palace (C64) Commodore 64

This a re/dux of an old 80s magazine game, but partially re-coded with some extra features as well as new dressing, now taking place at the an obscure distant fantasy palace in Baghdad. The game was inspired by and made during a bad illness and in part by the classic TV series I Dream of Jeannie (1965-1970) that was binge watched in its entirely synchronous from fevered dreams and bouts typing code at the Commodore 64 in 2021.

The game is pretty fun as you have to traverse the many cryptic chambers of this odd palace and make it to the final sultan's chamber.
